dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is a dataset used for training machine learning models, consisting of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 different classes, with 6,000 images per class.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
Fu Jie Huang
Leon Bottou
dcterms:description: SmallNORB is a dataset for object recognition that contains images of toys in various poses and lighting conditions, designed to test the robustness of recognition algorithms.
dcterms:title: SmallNORB

dcterms:creator: Han Xiao
Kashif Rasul
Roland Vollgraf
dcterms:description: FashionMNIST is a dataset consisting of 70,000 grayscale images of clothing items, intended as a drop-in replacement for the original MNIST dataset for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: FashionMNIST
